page_content:
Adapt Services Limited

Desktop as a Service

Adapt’s DaaS gives public sector organisations complete control over their desktop estates, delivering virtual desktop infrastructures that empower access to applications, emails, documents and data simply and securely from any mobile device. The service is easy to trial from within your own environment with clear, rapid ROI & benefits realisation.

Features

  • Single sign on virtualdesktop services accessible anytime, anywhere
  • Transparent subscription-per-user or per-item model
  • Safe, secure & resilient, supported 24/7 for interruption-free availability
  • Stable, controlled desktops: incident, change & capacity management
  • Simple desktop administration via Adapt’s role-aware portal
  • Basic entry point scaling to full VDI presentation if required.
  • Test and Dev environments to prove your virtual desktop strategy
  • Multiple deployment and integration options for Virtual Desktop Infrastructures
  • Solutions from VMware (Desktone), Horizon View, Citrix

Benefits

  • Remove compatibility issues: all applications run on all systems
  • Minimise impact of expansion & growth: scale quickly without CAPEX
  • Enable BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)
  • Reduce total cost of desktop ownership & support
  • Active Directory management services optional
  • No sensitive information stored locally on users’ desktops
  • Avoid the overhead of maintaining & supporting desktop infrastructure
  • Improve performance, increase productivity, reduce ‘time to benefit’

Pricing

£28 per user per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Month
  • Trial and free options available
